channel.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
channel.description:
Ask here for tips and tricks about this chapter. Tell where you're stuck and others will give the solutions.
[i](Please keep always on topic. Don't post about other chapters or create random chit-chat here)[/i]

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: miklkit
item.description:
Well, I muddled through it anyway and didn’t come close to making the jump to end it.

No changes? I guess I am getting too old for this shit.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Your map probably glitched, the numbers remain.

Also, I think you just got better at crouch jumping and whatnot, there haven’t been any released updates to Black Mesa since its release.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: miklkit
item.description:
I have gotten to the point where I need to work my way up the core by jumping from the rotating platforms into the core to get transported to the next level and I have run into a problem. The three entrances per level are no longer numbered and I seem to have a talent for finding the ones that kill me. Is my game glitched or were the numbers removed?

I have noticed that the developers have been updating the game since my last play through. The crouch jumping is much better now, and either I’m getting too old for this or it is overall harder now as I seem to be using a lot more ammo than before.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Popcornladder
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

Are you this rude to everyone who tries to help you, or is it just developers? Pretty uncalled for, honestly.

If the command map bm_c3a2h isn’t working, try changelevel bm_c3a2h. If neither of those work, then you are doing something wrong.

Sorry, I was like, half-asleep. No hard feelings.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
The engine read the command fine, it just didn’t find the specified map, which means it’s for some reason missing, or you’re doing something pretty wrong. Reboot the game, open the console, feed it the command map bm_c3a2h. There is no reason this shouldn’t work. If it doesn’t work, you somehow broke something (or at bad at using consoles), and the map is missing or corrupt. I’d reinstall, possibly tone back the attitude, maybe back up your saves and screenshots folder as well, if you’d like.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Are you this rude to everyone who tries to help you, or is it just developers? Pretty uncalled for, honestly.

If the command map bm_c3a2h isn’t working, try changelevel bm_c3a2h. If neither of those work, then you are doing something wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Popcornladder
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

restart should work if you’re already loaded in. Or you can do map bm_c3a2h

“Map change failed: ‘map bm_c3a2h’ not found on server”

Thanks so much! it almost worked!

Not sure if you picked that up. The game couldn’t read that command. I don’t know if you made a typo or if you’re just screwing with me.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1

restart should work if you’re already loaded in. Or you can do map bm_c3a2h

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Popcornladder
item.description:
Medkit:
Popcornladder:

Got in a bit of a pickle here; I’m right at the Lambda Core where I’m trying to protect the scientist while he activates it. Anyways, the game autosaved about 4 seconds before the thing blows up or whatever. I can’t even enable godmode to get out of it and I’m too far from it to jump in (If that’s what I’m supposed to do).

Our job is to protect the scientist allright. Once he says the portal is ready we should jump into it. I think you might have wasted too much time if you have only 4 seconds before the portal blows up, and you can’t reach it even with the longjump module. One option is to load an earlier save you made, or you can activate the console and reload this final map you are in.

Thanks, man! One question; What would the command be to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: terminator
item.description:
f2bnp:

How far back do I have to backtrack? Right after the scientist tells me I have open the pumps, I take the right bridge and get a loading message. After that I reach the area I’m currently in, which has two coolant tanks.
If I take a left earlier, I can’t proceed any further because the ceiling has collapsed!

You can continue further. Just duck around and you will be able to pass through the rubble

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
This is the area I’m talking about.

I tucked myself into that circled corner and hivehanded for all I’m worth. Of course, I was on Easy and a harder difficulty level might not work for you.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: maddinthebrain
item.description:
danielsangeo:

I tucked myself into that corner where you have those two elevated ledges, equipped the hivehand, and just held the fire button down for all my worth, spraying the chamber with thornets, until the scientist told me to jump into the portal orb.

It worked.

Thanks! I’ll try this.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Can the monsters kill the scientist there in the first place?

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
If you can’t fight them, kite them. Just long jump in circles.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: maddinthebrain
item.description:
Well I stuck in the final scene in big chamber during the preparations for the beam to XEN. Well there just too much enemies. Is there trick? OK, Shooting them down. But with one shot three more appears. Thats demotivating… Because they shoot you down in no time! Even that scientist takes too much time for his preparations. Any suggestions?

Thanks a lot! Merry Chrismas.

Maddin

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: janm190
item.description:
You should go to the big glass casing first. The female scientist will give you the long jump module, and if you stand by the guard, he will open a room full of ammo.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: dorkusip
item.description:
f2bnp:

How far back do I have to backtrack? Right after the scientist tells me I have open the pumps, I take the right bridge and get a loading message. After that I reach the area I’m currently in, which has two coolant tanks.
If I take a left earlier, I can’t proceed any further because the ceiling has collapsed!

You can crawl through the wreckage.

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: RkMaster
item.description:
Hi there,
I’m stuck at the last door where the scientist and the gaurd pull a gun on you after realising its me they put the gun down but thats it.
They dont open it no matter what i tryed reloading a previous save wich made me do the chapter all over again >.<
I tryed shooting the guard with the laser but he does nothing shooting the scientis results in a game over screen.

Pls help.:fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Kurt
item.description:
Sooo, I’m at the teleport sequence where I’m being sent off to Xen. I’m not stuck, but I never enabled the second reactor core. I got the first one, and could figure out #2 so I decided to try my luck at the aux thing. Next thing I know I’m being shipped off to Xen…

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Not really a sequel, per se, but the next release will be Xen with the G-Man ending.

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: erlandssonh
item.description:
I turn all 4 and aux tank green, nothing more to do, I go to the scientist and he says “You still have to open the other tank!”. I’ve turned the switch for 02 and fought my way back against enemies to get this buggy message. I go back to coolant 02, open the grate again, it lifts me to the ledge with the batteries again. The door is now locked, so I can’t get to the zombies etc. That grate just won’t stay open.

Maybe it’s because I gave up on coolant 02 and went to activate aux before discovering the ledge.

If I restart from tank 01 finished, is there some way to confirm that tank 02 is completely finished/will be accepted by the scientist? Because the red board with the lamps seems to mean nothing.

Restarted from before entering Lambda Core and did it in the correct sequence and finished the game.

Would have loved a G-Man ending, was a bit strange and cut off.

Teleports were hard and annoying.

Still, great job and can’t wait for the sequel

Read full topic

item.title: LAMBDA CORE - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: BlazeStryker
item.description:
Conti:

Except one, which can be fatal. :fffuuu:

Thankfully, that one is visually different than the others so you can avoid it.

Read full topic
